11428482Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The concrete entity.Di2015NewLine        IEntity entityMock = MockRepository.GenerateMock<IEntity>();Di2015NewLine        entityMock.Stub(s => s.Name).Return("Adam");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The runtime type of the entity, this'll be typeof(a RhinoMocks proxy).Di2015NewLine        Type dynamicType = entityMock.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Our open generic type.Di2015NewLine        Type cacheType = typeof(ICache<>);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the generic type of ICache<DynamicProxyForIEntity> (our closed generic type).Di2015NewLine        Type  genericType = cacheType.MakeGenericType(dynamicType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Concrete instance of ICache<DynamicProxyForIEntity>.Di2015NewLine        object stubbed = MockRepository.GenerateStub(genericType, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Because of the generic co-variance in ICache<out T>, we can cast ourDi2015NewLine        // dynamic concrete implementation down to a base representationDi2015NewLine        // (hint: try removing <out T> for <T> and it will compile, but not run).Di2015NewLine        ICache<IEntity> typedStub = (ICache<IEntity>)stubbed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Stub our interface with our concrete entity.Di2015NewLine        typedStub.Stub(s => s.Item).Return(entityMock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(typedStub.Item.Name); // Prints "Adam".Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface ICache<out T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T Item { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string Name { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11429195Di2015UniqueSeparator//generate a privatekey and public keyDi2015NewLineRsaKeyPairGenerator rkpg1 = new RsaKeyPairGenerator();Di2015NewLinerkpg1.Init(new KeyGenerationParameters(new SecureRandom(), Keystrength));Di2015NewLineAsymmetricCipherKeyPair ackp1 = rkpg1.GenerateKeyPair();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineRsaPrivateCrtKeyParameters privateKey = (RsaPrivateCrtKeyParameters)ackp1.Private;Di2015NewLineRsaKeyParameters publicKey = (RsaKeyParameters)ackp1.Public;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineX509Name comonname = new X509Name (cname);Di2015NewLinePkcs10CertificationRequest csr = new Pkcs10CertificationRequest ("SHA1WITHRSA", comonname, publicKey, null, privateKey);Di2015NewLinecsr.Verify ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLinePemWriter pw = new PemWriter (new StringWriter (sb));Di2015NewLinepw.WriteObject (csr);Di2015NewLinepw.Writer.Flush ();Di2015NewLinevar pemstring = sb.ToString ();Di2015NewLine
11429195Di2015UniqueSeparator//rootCert contains the rootcertificate in bouncycastle formatDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar pemstring = "a string containing the PEM";Di2015NewLinePemReader pr = new PemReader (new StringReader (pemstring));Di2015NewLinePkcs10CertificationRequest csr = (Pkcs10CertificationRequest)pr.ReadObject ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineX509V3CertificateGenerator certgen = new X509V3CertificateGenerator();Di2015NewLinecertgen.SetSubjectDN(csr.GetCertificationRequestInfo().Subject);Di2015NewLinecertgen.SetIssuerDN(rootCert.SubjectDN);Di2015NewLinecertgen.SetPublicKey(csr.GetPublicKey());Di2015NewLinecertgen.SetSignatureAlgorithm(csr.SignatureAlgorithm.ObjectID.Id);Di2015NewLinecertgen.SetNotAfter(validThrough); //a datetime objectDi2015NewLinecertgen.SetNotBefore(validFrom); //a datetime objectDi2015NewLinecertgen.SetSerialNumber(serialNumber); //a bigintegerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineX509Certificate clientcert = certgen.Generate(rootPrivateKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//to send the certificate without the private key to the client you'll have to Di2015NewLine//convert it to PEM:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLinePemWriter pw = new PemWriter (new StringWriter (sb));Di2015NewLinepw.WriteObject (clientcert);Di2015NewLinepw.Writer.Flush ();Di2015NewLinevar pemstring = sb.ToString ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//to make it a .net certificate use:Di2015NewLineX509Certificate2 netcert = DotNetUtilities.ToX509Certificate (clientcert);Di2015NewLine
11429195Di2015UniqueSeparator//where pemstring contains the certificate in a PEMstring like shown above.Di2015NewLine//and privateKey is the one we had in the first part over at the client.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePemReader pr = new PemReader(new StringReader(pemstring));Di2015NewLineX509Certificate2 cert = DotNetUtilities.ToX509Certificate((Bouncy.X509Certificate)pr.ReadObject());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCspParameters cparms = new CspParametersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CryptoKeySecurity = new CryptoKeySecurity(),Di2015NewLine    Flags = CspProviderFlags.UseMachineKeyStoreDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineRSACryptoServiceProvider rcsp = new RSACryptoServiceProvider(cparms);Di2015NewLineRSAParameters parms = new RSAParametersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Modulus = privateKey.Modulus.ToByteArrayUnsigned (),Di2015NewLine    P = privateKey.P.ToByteArrayUnsigned (),Di2015NewLine    Q = privateKey.Q.ToByteArrayUnsigned (),Di2015NewLine    DP = privateKey.DP.ToByteArrayUnsigned (),Di2015NewLine    DQ = privateKey.DQ.ToByteArrayUnsigned (),Di2015NewLine    InverseQ = privateKey.QInv.ToByteArrayUnsigned (),Di2015NewLine    D = privateKey.Exponent.ToByteArrayUnsigned (),Di2015NewLine    Exponent = privateKey.PublicExponent.ToByteArrayUnsigned ()Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinercsp.ImportParameters(parms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenetcert.PrivateKey = rcsp;Di2015NewLine

11438397Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Splits an enumeration based on a predicate.</summary>Di2015NewLine/// <remarks>Di2015NewLine/// This method drops partitioning elements.Di2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<TSource>> Split<TSource>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<TSource, bool> partitionBy,Di2015NewLine    bool removeEmptyEntries = false,Di2015NewLine    int count = -1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int yielded = 0;Di2015NewLine    var items = new List<TSource>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!partitionBy(item))Di2015NewLine            items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        else if (!removeEmptyEntries || items.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return items.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            items.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (count > 0 && ++yielded == count) yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (items.Count > 0) yield return items.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11439226Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyWebClient : WebClient, IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Timeout { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int TimeUntilFirstByte { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int TimeBetweenProgressChanges { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public long PreviousBytesReceived { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public long BytesNotNotified { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Error { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool HasError { get { return Error != null; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool firstByteReceived = false;Di2015NewLine    private bool success = true;Di2015NewLine    private bool cancelDueToError = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private EventWaitHandle asyncWait = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private Timer abortTimer = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const long ONE_MB = 1024 * 1024;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public delegate void PerMbHandler(long totalMb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PerMbHandler NotifyMegabyteIncrement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyWebClient(int timeout = 60000, int timeUntilFirstByte = 30000, int timeBetweenProgressChanges = 15000)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Timeout = timeout;Di2015NewLine        this.TimeUntilFirstByte = timeUntilFirstByte;Di2015NewLine        this.TimeBetweenProgressChanges = timeBetweenProgressChanges;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.DownloadFileCompleted += new System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventHandler(MyWebClient_DownloadFileCompleted);Di2015NewLine        this.DownloadProgressChanged += new DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(MyWebClient_DownloadProgressChanged);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        abortTimer = new Timer(AbortDownload, null, TimeUntilFirstByte, System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void OnNotifyMegabyteIncrement(long totalMb)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (NotifyMegabyteIncrement != null) NotifyMegabyteIncrement(totalMb);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void AbortDownload(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cancelDueToError = true;Di2015NewLine        this.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine        success = false;Di2015NewLine        Error = firstByteReceived ? "Download aborted due to >" + TimeBetweenProgressChanges + "ms between progress change updates." : "No data was received in " + TimeUntilFirstByte + "ms";Di2015NewLine        asyncWait.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void MyWebClient_DownloadProgressChanged(object sender, DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (cancelDueToError) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long additionalBytesReceived = e.BytesReceived - PreviousBytesReceived;Di2015NewLine        PreviousBytesReceived = e.BytesReceived;Di2015NewLine        BytesNotNotified += additionalBytesReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (BytesNotNotified > ONE_MB)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OnNotifyMegabyteIncrement(e.BytesReceived);Di2015NewLine            BytesNotNotified = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        firstByteReceived = true;Di2015NewLine        abortTimer.Change(TimeBetweenProgressChanges, System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool DownloadFileWithEvents(string url, string outputPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        asyncWait.Reset();Di2015NewLine        Uri uri = new Uri(url);Di2015NewLine        this.DownloadFileAsync(uri, outputPath);Di2015NewLine        asyncWait.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return success;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void MyWebClient_DownloadFileCompleted(object sender, System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (cancelDueToError) return;Di2015NewLine        asyncWait.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override WebRequest GetWebRequest(Uri address)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        var result = base.GetWebRequest(address);Di2015NewLine        result.Timeout = this.Timeout;Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void IDisposable.Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (asyncWait != null) asyncWait.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        if (abortTimer != null) abortTimer.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11439350Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Q11438740ConAppDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string sourceStr = "1y 250 2y 32% 3y otherjibberish";Di2015NewLine            Regex rx = new Regex(@"\\d+y");Di2015NewLine            string[] splitedArray = SplitByRegex(sourceStr, rx);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < splitedArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(String.Format("'{0}'", splitedArray[i]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string[] SplitByRegex(string input, Regex rx)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MatchCollection matches = rx.Matches(input);Di2015NewLine            String[] outArray = new string[matches.Count];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < matches.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int length = 0;Di2015NewLine                if (i == matches.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    length = input.Length - (matches[i].Index + matches[i].Length);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    length = matches[i + 1].Index - (matches[i].Index + matches[i].Length);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                outArray[i] = matches[i].Value + input.Substring(matches[i].Index + matches[i].Length, length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return outArray;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11440888Di2015UniqueSeparator   [ReliabilityContract(Consistency.MayCorruptInstance, Cer.MayFail)]Di2015NewLine   public static void Sort<T>(T[] array, int index, int length, System.Collections.Generic.IComprer<T> comparer) {Di2015NewLine       if (array==null)Di2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentNullException("array");Di2015NewLine       if (index < 0 || length < 0)Di2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException((length<0 ? "length" : "index"), Environment.GeResourceString("ArgumentOutOfRange_NeedNonNegNum"));Di2015NewLine       if (array.Length - index < length)Di2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentException(Environment.GetResourceString("Argument_InvalidOffLen"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       Contract.EndContractBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (length > 1) {Di2015NewLine           // <STRIP>Di2015NewLine           // TrySZSort is still faster than the generic implementation.Di2015NewLine           // The reason is Int32.CompareTo is still expensive than just using "<" or ">".Di2015NewLine           // </STRIP>Di2015NewLine           if ( comparer == null || comparer == Comparer<T>.Default ) {Di2015NewLine               if(TrySZSort(array, null, index, index + length - 1)) {Di2015NewLine                   return;Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           ArraySortHelper<T>.Default.Sort(array, index, length, comparer);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

11441265Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int[] Merge(int[] array1, int[] array2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var mergedArray = new int[array1.Length + array2.Length];Di2015NewLine    int i = 0, j = 0, k = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(k < mergedArray.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (j == array2.Length || ((i < array1.Length) && (array[i] < array2[j])))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mergedArray[k] = array1[i];Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mergedArray[k] = array2[j];Di2015NewLine            j++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        k++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return mergedArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11441265Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int[] Merge(int[] array1, int[] array2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var mergedArray = new int[array1.Length + array2.Length];Di2015NewLine    int i = 0, j = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(i+j < mergedArray.Length)Di2015NewLine        if (j == array2.Length || ((i < array1.Length) && (array1[i] < array2[j])))Di2015NewLine            mergedArray[i+j] = array1[i++];Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            mergedArray[i+j] = array2[j++];Di2015NewLine    return mergedArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11444061Di2015UniqueSeparatorMarshal.Copy()
11444061Di2015UniqueSeparatorreadLock.Scan0 + y * readLock.Stride
11444061Di2015UniqueSeparatorreadLock.Width * bytes-per-pixel
11444061Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int BYTES_PER_PIXEL = 3;Di2015NewLinevar data = new byte[readLock.Width * readLock.Height * BYTES_PER_PIXEL];Di2015NewLineif(readLock.Stride == readLock.Width * BYTES_PER_PIXEL)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Marshal.Copy(readLock.Scan0, data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for(int y = 0; y < readLock.Height; ++y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr startOfLine = (IntPtr)((long)readLock.Scan0 + (readLock.Stride * y));Di2015NewLine        int dataOffset = y * readLock.Width * BYTES_PER_PIXEL;Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(startOfLine, data, dataOffset, readLock.Width * BYTES_PER_PIXEL);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11450095Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<Node> AllBinaryTrees(int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (size == 0)Di2015NewLine        return new Node[] { null };Di2015NewLine    return from i in Enumerable.Range(0, size)Di2015NewLine           from left in AllBinaryTrees(i)Di2015NewLine           from right in AllBinaryTrees(size - 1 - i)Di2015NewLine           select new Node(left, right);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11450803Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void StartListeningPipes()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(!this.isServerRunning)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var pipeClientConnection = new NamedPipeServerStream(...);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pipeClientConnection.BeginWaitForConnection(asyncResult =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // note that the body of the lambda is not part of the outer try... catch block!Di2015NewLine                using(var conn = (NamedPipeServerStream)asyncResult.AsyncState)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        conn.EndWaitForConnection(result);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch(...)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ...Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // we have a connection established, time to wait for new ones while this thread does its business with the clientDi2015NewLine                    // this may look like a recursive call, but it is not: remember, we're in a lambda expressionDi2015NewLine                    // if this bothers you, just export the lambda into a named private method, like you did in your questionDi2015NewLine                    StartListeningPipes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // do business with the clientDi2015NewLine                    conn.WaitForPipeDrain();Di2015NewLine                    ...Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }, pipeClientConnection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(...)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11455084Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime lastUpdate = ...;  // Retrieve from DBDi2015NewLineTimeSpan elapsed = DateTime.Now - lastUpdate;Di2015NewLineif (elapsed.TotalMinutes >= 15)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11455088Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Inserts a new row at the desired index. If one already exists, then it isDi2015NewLine        /// returned. If an insertRow is provided, then it is inserted into the desiredDi2015NewLine        /// rowIndexDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="rowIndex">Row Index</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="worksheetPart">Worksheet Part</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="insertRow">Row to insert</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="isLastRow">Optional parameter - True, you can guarantee that this row is the last row (not replacing an existing last row) in the sheet to insert; false it is not</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Inserted Row</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static Row InsertRow(uint rowIndex, WorksheetPart worksheetPart, Row insertRow, bool isNewLastRow = false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Worksheet worksheet = worksheetPart.Worksheet;Di2015NewLine            SheetData sheetData = worksheet.GetFirstChild<SheetData>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Row retRow = !isNewLastRow ? sheetData.Elements<Row>().FirstOrDefault(r => r.RowIndex == rowIndex) : null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the worksheet does not contain a row with the specified row index, insert one.Di2015NewLine            if (retRow != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // if retRow is not null and we are inserting a new row, then move all existing rows down.Di2015NewLine                if (insertRow != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    UpdateRowIndexes(worksheetPart, rowIndex, false);Di2015NewLine                    UpdateMergedCellReferences(worksheetPart, rowIndex, false);Di2015NewLine                    UpdateHyperlinkReferences(worksheetPart, rowIndex, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // actually insert the new row into the sheetDi2015NewLine                    retRow = sheetData.InsertBefore(insertRow, retRow);  // at this point, retRow still points to the row that had the insert rowIndexDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    string curIndex = retRow.RowIndex.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    string newIndex = rowIndex.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (Cell cell in retRow.Elements<Cell>())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Update the references for the rows cells.Di2015NewLine                        cell.CellReference = new StringValue(cell.CellReference.Value.Replace(curIndex, newIndex));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Update the row index.Di2015NewLine                    retRow.RowIndex = rowIndex;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Row doesn't exist yet, shifting not needed.Di2015NewLine                // Rows must be in sequential order according to RowIndex. Determine where to insert the new row.Di2015NewLine                Row refRow = !isNewLastRow ? sheetData.Elements<Row>().FirstOrDefault(row => row.RowIndex > rowIndex) : null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // use the insert row if it existsDi2015NewLine                retRow = insertRow ?? new Row() { RowIndex = rowIndex };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                IEnumerable<Cell> cellsInRow = retRow.Elements<Cell>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (cellsInRow.Any())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string curIndex = retRow.RowIndex.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    string newIndex = rowIndex.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (Cell cell in cellsInRow)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Update the references for the rows cells.Di2015NewLine                        cell.CellReference = new StringValue(cell.CellReference.Value.Replace(curIndex, newIndex));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Update the row index.Di2015NewLine                    retRow.RowIndex = rowIndex;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sheetData.InsertBefore(retRow, refRow);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return retRow;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
11455088Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Updates all of the Row indexes and the child Cells' CellReferences wheneverDi2015NewLine    /// a row is inserted or deleted.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="worksheetPart">Worksheet Part</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rowIndex">Row Index being inserted or deleted</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="isDeletedRow">True if row was deleted, otherwise false</param>Di2015NewLine    private static void UpdateRowIndexes(WorksheetPart worksheetPart, uint rowIndex, bool isDeletedRow)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get all the rows in the worksheet with equal or higher row index values than the one being inserted/deleted for reindexing.Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<Row> rows = worksheetPart.Worksheet.Descendants<Row>().Where(r => r.RowIndex.Value >= rowIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Row row in rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uint newIndex = (isDeletedRow ? row.RowIndex - 1 : row.RowIndex + 1);Di2015NewLine            string curRowIndex = row.RowIndex.ToString();Di2015NewLine            string newRowIndex = newIndex.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Cell cell in row.Elements<Cell>())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Update the references for the rows cells.Di2015NewLine                cell.CellReference = new StringValue(cell.CellReference.Value.Replace(curRowIndex, newRowIndex));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Update the row index.Di2015NewLine            row.RowIndex = newIndex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Updates the MergedCelss reference whenever a new row is inserted or deleted. It will simply take theDi2015NewLine        /// row index and either increment or decrement the cell row index in the merged cell reference based onDi2015NewLine        /// if the row was inserted or deleted.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="worksheetPart">Worksheet Part</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="rowIndex">Row Index being inserted or deleted</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="isDeletedRow">True if row was deleted, otherwise false</param>Di2015NewLine        private static void UpdateMergedCellReferences(WorksheetPart worksheetPart, uint rowIndex, bool isDeletedRow)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (worksheetPart.Worksheet.Elements<MergeCells>().Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MergeCells mergeCells = worksheetPart.Worksheet.Elements<MergeCells>().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (mergeCells != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Grab all the merged cells that have a merge cell row index reference equal to or greater than the row index passed inDi2015NewLine                    List<MergeCell> mergeCellsList = mergeCells.Elements<MergeCell>().Where(r => r.Reference.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                                                                                     .Where(r => GetRowIndex(r.Reference.Value.Split(':').ElementAt(0)) >= rowIndex ||Di2015NewLine                                                                                                 GetRowIndex(r.Reference.Value.Split(':').ElementAt(1)) >= rowIndex).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Need to remove all merged cells that have a matching rowIndex when the row is deletedDi2015NewLine                    if (isDeletedRow)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        List<MergeCell> mergeCellsToDelete = mergeCellsList.Where(r => GetRowIndex(r.Reference.Value.Split(':').ElementAt(0)) == rowIndex ||Di2015NewLine                                                                                       GetRowIndex(r.Reference.Value.Split(':').ElementAt(1)) == rowIndex).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Delete all the matching merged cellsDi2015NewLine                        foreach (MergeCell cellToDelete in mergeCellsToDelete)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            cellToDelete.Remove();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Update the list to contain all merged cells greater than the deleted row indexDi2015NewLine                        mergeCellsList = mergeCells.Elements<MergeCell>().Where(r => r.Reference.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                                                                         .Where(r => GetRowIndex(r.Reference.Value.Split(':').ElementAt(0)) > rowIndex ||Di2015NewLine                                                                                     GetRowIndex(r.Reference.Value.Split(':').ElementAt(1)) > rowIndex).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Either increment or decrement the row index on the merged cell referenceDi2015NewLine                    foreach (MergeCell mergeCell in mergeCellsList)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string[] cellReference = mergeCell.Reference.Value.Split(':');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (GetRowIndex(cellReference.ElementAt(0)) >= rowIndex)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            string columnName = GetColumnName(cellReference.ElementAt(0));Di2015NewLine                            cellReference[0] = isDeletedRow ? columnName + (GetRowIndex(cellReference.ElementAt(0)) - 1).ToString() : IncrementCellReference(cellReference.ElementAt(0), CellReferencePartEnum.Row);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (GetRowIndex(cellReference.ElementAt(1)) >= rowIndex)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            string columnName = GetColumnName(cellReference.ElementAt(1));Di2015NewLine                            cellReference[1] = isDeletedRow ? columnName + (GetRowIndex(cellReference.ElementAt(1)) - 1).ToString() : IncrementCellReference(cellReference.ElementAt(1), CellReferencePartEnum.Row);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        mergeCell.Reference = new StringValue(cellReference[0] + ":" + cellReference[1]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Updates all hyperlinks in the worksheet when a row is inserted or deleted.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="worksheetPart">Worksheet Part</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="rowIndex">Row Index being inserted or deleted</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="isDeletedRow">True if row was deleted, otherwise false</param>Di2015NewLine        private static void UpdateHyperlinkReferences(WorksheetPart worksheetPart, uint rowIndex, bool isDeletedRow)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Hyperlinks hyperlinks = worksheetPart.Worksheet.Elements<Hyperlinks>().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (hyperlinks != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Match hyperlinkRowIndexMatch;Di2015NewLine                uint hyperlinkRowIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (Hyperlink hyperlink in hyperlinks.Elements<Hyperlink>())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    hyperlinkRowIndexMatch = Regex.Match(hyperlink.Reference.Value, "[0-9]+");Di2015NewLine                    if (hyperlinkRowIndexMatch.Success && uint.TryParse(hyperlinkRowIndexMatch.Value, out hyperlinkRowIndex) && hyperlinkRowIndex >= rowIndex)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // if being deleted, hyperlink needs to be removed or moved upDi2015NewLine                        if (isDeletedRow)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // if hyperlink is on the row being removed, remove itDi2015NewLine                            if (hyperlinkRowIndex == rowIndex)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                hyperlink.Remove();Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            // else hyperlink needs to be moved up a rowDi2015NewLine                            else{Di2015NewLine                                hyperlink.Reference.Value = hyperlink.Reference.Value.Replace(hyperlinkRowIndexMatch.Value, (hyperlinkRowIndex - 1).ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        // else row is being inserted, move hyperlink downDi2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            hyperlink.Reference.Value = hyperlink.Reference.Value.Replace(hyperlinkRowIndexMatch.Value, (hyperlinkRowIndex + 1).ToString());Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Remove the hyperlinks collection if none remainDi2015NewLine                if (hyperlinks.Elements<Hyperlink>().Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    hyperlinks.Remove();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Given a cell name, parses the specified cell to get the row index.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="cellReference">Address of the cell (ie. B2)</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Row Index (ie. 2)</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static uint GetRowIndex(string cellReference)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create a regular expression to match the row index portion the cell name.Di2015NewLine            Regex regex = new Regex(@"\\d+");Di2015NewLine            Match match = regex.Match(cellReference);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return uint.Parse(match.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Increments the reference of a given cell.  This reference comes from the CellReference propertyDi2015NewLine        /// on a Cell.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="reference">reference string</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="cellRefPart">indicates what is to be incremented</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static string IncrementCellReference(string reference, CellReferencePartEnum cellRefPart)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string newReference = reference;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (cellRefPart != CellReferencePartEnum.None && !String.IsNullOrEmpty(reference))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string[] parts = Regex.Split(reference, "([A-Z]+)");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (cellRefPart == CellReferencePartEnum.Column || cellRefPart == CellReferencePartEnum.Both)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    List<char> col = parts[1].ToCharArray().ToList();Di2015NewLine                    bool needsIncrement = true;Di2015NewLine                    int index = col.Count - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    doDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // increment the last letterDi2015NewLine                        col[index] = Letters[Letters.IndexOf(col[index]) + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // if it is the last letter, then we need to roll it over to 'A'Di2015NewLine                        if (col[index] == Letters[Letters.Count - 1])Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            col[index] = Letters[0];Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            needsIncrement = false;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    } while (needsIncrement && --index >= 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // If true, then we need to add another letter to the mix. Initial value was something like "ZZ"Di2015NewLine                    if (needsIncrement)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        col.Add(Letters[0]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    parts[1] = new String(col.ToArray());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (cellRefPart == CellReferencePartEnum.Row || cellRefPart == CellReferencePartEnum.Both)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Increment the row number. A reference is invalid without this componenet, so we assume it will always be present.Di2015NewLine                    parts[2] = (int.Parse(parts[2]) + 1).ToString();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                newReference = parts[1] + parts[2];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return newReference;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

11457554Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PdfNewPageExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // throws DocumentException, FileNotFoundExceptionDi2015NewLine    public static void main( String ... a ) throws ExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String fileHome = System.getProperty( "user.home" ) + "/Desktop/";Di2015NewLine        String pdfFileName = "Pdf-NewPage-Example.pdf";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // step 1Di2015NewLine        Document document = new Document();Di2015NewLine        // step 2Di2015NewLine        FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream( fileHome + pdfFileName );Di2015NewLine        PdfWriter writer = PdfWriter.getInstance( document, FileOutputStream );Di2015NewLine        // step 3Di2015NewLine        document.open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // step 4Di2015NewLine        document.add( new Paragraph( "This page will NOT be followed by a blank page!" ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        document.newPage();Di2015NewLine        // we don't add anything to this page: newPage() will be ignoredDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        document.newPage();Di2015NewLine        document.add( new Paragraph( "This page will be followed by a blank page!" ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        document.newPage();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.setPageEmpty( false );Di2015NewLine        document.newPage();Di2015NewLine        document.add( new Paragraph( "The previous page was a blank page!" ) );Di2015NewLine        // step 5Di2015NewLine        document.close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.out.println( "Done ..." );Di2015NewLine    } // psvm( .. )Di2015NewLine} // class PdfNewPageExampleDi2015NewLine

id);Di2015NewLine        return new FileContentResult(ReadFully(attachment.Data()), attachment.Metadata["ContentType"].ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] ReadToEnd(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long originalPosition = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (stream.CanSeek)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            originalPosition = stream.Position;Di2015NewLine            stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var readBuffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int totalBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((bytesRead = stream.Read(readBuffer, totalBytesRead, readBuffer.Length - totalBytesRead)) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                totalBytesRead += bytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (totalBytesRead == readBuffer.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int nextByte = stream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine                    if (nextByte != -1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var temp = new byte[readBuffer.Length*2];Di2015NewLine                        Buffer.BlockCopy(readBuffer, 0, temp, 0, readBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                        Buffer.SetByte(temp, totalBytesRead, (byte) nextByte);Di2015NewLine                        readBuffer = temp;Di2015NewLine                        totalBytesRead++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = readBuffer;Di2015NewLine            if (readBuffer.Length != totalBytesRead)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buffer = new byte[totalBytesRead];Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(readBuffer, 0, buffer, 0, totalBytesRead);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return buffer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (stream.CanSeek)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stream.Position = originalPosition;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] ReadFully(Stream input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[16 * 1024];Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int read;Di2015NewLine            while ((read = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ms.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

ScannerPort_DataReceived(object sender, System.IO.Ports.SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this call to sleep allows the scanner to receive the entire scan.Di2015NewLine        // without this sleep, we've found that we get only a partial scan.Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DoScan();Di2015NewLine System.Environment.NewLine + ScanData.Length.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Determine which type of barcode has been scanned, and handle appropriately.Di2015NewLine        if (ScanData.StartsWith("A") && ScanData.Length == 14)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ProcessUpcCoupon(ScanData);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                     System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep.Play();Di2015NewLine (ScanData.StartsWith("8110"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ProcessDataBarCoupon(ScanData);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                     System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep.Play();Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine                System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep.Play();Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Invalid Scan" + System.Environment.NewLine + ScanData);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InitializeScanner()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 11465679Di2015UniqueSeparatorTextBlock.IsHypenationEnabled
11465679Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Adds break to a TextBlock according to a specified tagDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text">The text containing the tags to break up</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="tb">The TextBlock we are assigning this text to</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="tag">The tag, eg <br> to use in adding breaks</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public string WordWrap(string text, TextBlock tb, string tag)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //get the amount of text that can fit into the textblockDi2015NewLine        int len = (int)Math.Round((2 * tb.ActualWidth / tb.FontSize));Di2015NewLine        string original = text.Replace(tag, "");Di2015NewLine        string ret = "";Di2015NewLine        while (original.Length > len)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //get index where tag occurredDi2015NewLine            int i = text.IndexOf(tag);Di2015NewLine            //get index where whitespace occurredDi2015NewLine            int j = original.IndexOf(" ");Di2015NewLine            //does tag occur earlier than whitespace, then let's use that index instead!Di2015NewLine            if (j > i && j < len)Di2015NewLine                i = j;Di2015NewLine            //if we usde index of whitespace, there is no need to hyphenateDi2015NewLine            ret += (i == j) ? original.Substring(0, i) + "\\n" : original.Substring(0, i) + "-\\n";Di2015NewLine            //if we used index of whitespace, then let's remove the whitespaceDi2015NewLine            original = (i == j) ? original.Substring(i + 1) : original.Substring(i);Di2015NewLine            text = text.Substring(i + tag.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ret + original;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11465679Di2015UniqueSeparatortextBlock1.Text = WordWrap("StackOver<br>Flow In<br> U", textBlock1, "<br>");Di2015NewLine

11471170Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T[][] ConvertToJaggedArray<T>(T [,] multiArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int numOfColumns=multiArray.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine  int numOfRows=multiArray.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine  T[][] jaggedArray = new T[numOfColumns][];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int c = 0; c < numOfColumns; c++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      jaggedArray[c] = new T[numOfRows];Di2015NewLine      for (int r = 0; r < numOfRows; r++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          jaggedArray[c][r] = multiArray[c, r];Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return jaggedArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11474760Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var words = new List<string> {"w1", "w2", "w3", "w4", "w5", "w6", "w7"};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var list in Generate(words, 3))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(string.Join(", ", list));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<List<string>> Generate(List<string> words, int length, int ix = 0, int[] indexes = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    indexes = indexes ?? Enumerable.Range(0, length).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ix > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return indexes.Take(ix).Select(x => words[x]).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ix > length)Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ix == length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return indexes.Select(x => words[x]).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int jx = ix > 0 ? indexes[ix-1]+1 : 0; jx < words.Count; jx++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            indexes[ix] = jx;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var list in Generate(words, length, ix + 1, indexes))Di2015NewLine                yield return list;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11475083Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string DecompressData(string compressedData) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] gZipBffr = Convert.FromBase64String(compressedData); Di2015NewLine    using (var mStream = new MemoryStream()) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        mStream.Write(gZipBffr, 4, gZipBffr.Length - 4);      Di2015NewLine        mStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var bytes = new byte[0]; Di2015NewLine        using (var gZipStream = new GZipStream(mStream, Di2015NewLine                                               CompressionMode.Decompress)) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[100];Di2015NewLine            int read;Di2015NewLine            while((read = gZipStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newBytes = new byte[bytes.Length + read];Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(bytes, newBytes, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(buffer, 0, newBytes, bytes.Length, read);Di2015NewLine                bytes = newBytes;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(bytes); Di2015NewLine   }          Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11475760Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override object BindModel(Di2015NewLine    ControllerContext controllerContext, Di2015NewLine    ModelBindingContext bindingContext)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object model = base.BindModel(controllerContext, bindingCOntext);Di2015NewLine    if (/* test for empty properties, or some other state */)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return model;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11475760Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Model binder that will return null if all of the properties on a bound model come back as nullDi2015NewLine/// It inherits from DefaultModelBinder because it uses the default model binding functionality.Di2015NewLine/// This implementation also needs to specifically have IModelBinder on it too, otherwise it wont get picked up as a BinderDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class SearchDataModelBinder : DefaultModelBinder, IModelBinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object BindModel(ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // use the default model binding functionality to build a model, we'll look at each property belowDi2015NewLine        object model = base.BindModel(controllerContext, bindingContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // loop through every property for the model in the metadataDi2015NewLine        foreach (ModelMetadata property in bindingContext.PropertyMetadata.Values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the value of this property on the modelDi2015NewLine            var value = bindingContext.ModelType.GetProperty(property.PropertyName).GetValue(model, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if any property is not null, then we will want the model that the default model binder createdDi2015NewLine            if (value != null)Di2015NewLine                return model;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if we're here then there were either no properties or the properties were all nullDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11475760Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Application_Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    AreaRegistration.RegisterAllAreas();Di2015NewLine    ModelBinders.Binders.Add(typeof(SearchData), new SearchDataModelBinder());Di2015NewLine    RegisterGlobalFilters(GlobalFilters.Filters);Di2015NewLine    RegisterRoutes(RouteTable.Routes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MvcHandler.DisableMvcResponseHeader = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11477867Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UploadFileDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public UploadFile()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ContentType = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Filename { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string ContentType { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Stream Stream { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class WebClientExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] UploadFiles(this WebClient client, string address, IEnumerable<UploadFile> files, NameValueCollection values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = WebRequest.Create(address);Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine        var boundary = "---------------------------" + DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString("x", NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo);Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + boundary;Di2015NewLine        boundary = "--" + boundary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var requestStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Write the valuesDi2015NewLine            foreach (string name in values.Keys)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine                requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"{1}{1}", name, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine                requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(values[name] + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine                requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Write the filesDi2015NewLine            foreach (var file in files)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine                requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"; filename=\\"{1}\\"{2}", file.Name, file.Filename, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine                requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(string.Format("Content-Type: {0}{1}{1}", file.ContentType, Environment.NewLine));Di2015NewLine                requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                file.Stream.CopyTo(requestStream);Di2015NewLine                buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine                requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var boundaryBuffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(boundary + "--");Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(boundaryBuffer, 0, boundaryBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var response = request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine        using (var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        using (var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            responseStream.CopyTo(stream);Di2015NewLine            return stream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11481317Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<population>\\d\\(.\\d+)?)  #capturing group named "population"Di2015NewLine                           #that is a number, optionally followed by aDi2015NewLine                           #decimal point and at least one numberDi2015NewLine\\s*                        #followed by one or more spacesDi2015NewLine(?<magnitude>thousand|(m|b)illion)? #optional capturing group named "magnitude"Di2015NewLine                                    # that matches "thousand", "million", or "billion"Di2015NewLine\\s*                        #one or more whitespace charactersDi2015NewLinepeople                     #the literal "people"Di2015NewLine.*                         #match any number of charactersDi2015NewLine\\(                         #Find literal opening parentheses...Di2015NewLine   (?<year>\\d{4})          #...followed by a four-digit year...Di2015NewLine\\s                         #...followed by a space...Di2015NewLineestimate\\)                 #...followed by the phrase "estimate)"Di2015NewLine\\s*$                       #followed by optional whitespaceDi2015NewLine                           #and the end of the stringDi2015NewLine
11481317Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine/// Generate test stringsDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<string> Generator()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    yield return "3.72 million people (country rank: 6th) (2004 estimate)";Di2015NewLine    yield return "10000 people (2007 estimate)";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string expression = @"Di2015NewLine(?<population>\\d(.\\d+)?)  #capturing group named 'population'Di2015NewLine                           #that is a number, optionally followed by aDi2015NewLine                           #decimal point and at least one numberDi2015NewLine\\s*                        #followed by one or more spacesDi2015NewLine(?<magnitude>thousand|(m|b)illion)? #optional capturing group named 'magnitude'Di2015NewLine                                    # that matches 'thousand', 'million', or 'billion'Di2015NewLine\\s*                        #one or more whitespace charactersDi2015NewLinepeople                     #the literal 'people'Di2015NewLine.*                         #match any number of charactersDi2015NewLine\\(                         #Find literal opening parentheses...Di2015NewLine   (?<year>\\d{4})          #...followed by a four-digit year...Di2015NewLine\\s                         #...followed by a space...Di2015NewLineestimate\\)                 #...followed by the phrase 'estimate'Di2015NewLine\\s*$                       #followed by optional whitespaceDi2015NewLine                           #and the end of the string";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RegexOptions options = Di2015NewLine        RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace // allow whitespace/commentsDi2015NewLine        | RegexOptions.IgnoreCaseDi2015NewLine        | RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture; // Only capture named groupsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Regex r = new Regex(expression, options);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var test in Generator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Match match = r.Match(test);Di2015NewLine        if (!match.Success)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Could not match {0}", test);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double population = double.Parse(match.Groups["population"].Value);Di2015NewLine            if (match.Groups["magnitude"].Success) // magnitude is optionalDi2015NewLine                                                   // but if present, need toDi2015NewLine                                                   // multiply populationDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (match.Groups["magnitude"].Value.ToLower())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case "thousand": population *= 1000; break;Di2015NewLine                    case "million": population *= 1E6; break;Di2015NewLine                    case "billion": population *= 1E9; break;Di2015NewLine                    default: throw new FormatException("Unexpected value in magnitude group");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int year = int.Parse(match.Groups["year"].Value);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("In {0}, population was {1} people.", year, population);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11481933Di2015UniqueSeparatorTryParse
11481933Di2015UniqueSeparator    //Try Parse using ReflectionDi2015NewLinepublic static bool TryConvertValue<T>(string stringValue, out T convertedValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var targetType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    if (targetType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        convertedValue = (T)Convert.ChangeType(stringValue, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine        var nullableType = targetType.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine                       targetType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof (Nullable<>);Di2015NewLine    if (nullableType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringValue))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            convertedValue = default(T);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine            targetType = new NullableConverter(targetType).UnderlyingType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type[] argTypes = { typeof(string), targetType.MakeByRefType() };Di2015NewLine    var tryParseMethodInfo = targetType.GetMethod("TryParse", argTypes);Di2015NewLine    if (tryParseMethodInfo == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        convertedValue = default(T);Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    object[] args = { stringValue, null };Di2015NewLine    var successfulParse = (bool)tryParseMethodInfo.Invoke(null, args);Di2015NewLine    if (!successfulParse)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        convertedValue = default(T);Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    convertedValue = (T)args[1];Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11483120Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] arr1 = new string[]Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                "Pakistan:4,India:3,USA:2,Iran:1,UK:0",Di2015NewLine                                "Pakistan:4,India:3,USA:2,Iran:1,UK:0",Di2015NewLine                                "India:4,USA:3,Iran:2,UK:1,Pakistan:0"Di2015NewLine                            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar count = arr1Di2015NewLine    .SelectMany(s => s.Split(new[] { ',' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries))Di2015NewLine    .GroupBy(s => s.Split(':')[0], s => s.Split(':')[1])Di2015NewLine    .ToDictionary(g => g.Key,Di2015NewLine         g =>Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              var items = g.Distinct();Di2015NewLine              var result = new Dictionary<String, int>();Di2015NewLine              foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine                  result[item] = g.Count(gitem => gitem == item);Di2015NewLine              return result;Di2015NewLine         });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// print the resultDi2015NewLineforeach(var country in count.Keys)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     foreach(var ocurrence in count[country].Keys)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          Console.WriteLine("{0} : {1} = {2}", country, ocurrence, count[country][ocurrence]);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11485598Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IList<T>> ToBuckets(this IEnumerable<T> source, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var bucket = new List<T>(size);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bucket.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        if (bucket.Count == size) {Di2015NewLine           yield return bucket;Di2015NewLine           bucket = new List<T>(size); // or you can use the same one if you're carefulDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (bucket.Count > 0) yield return bucket;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11486686Di2015UniqueSeparator// The list of swear wordsDi2015NewLineList<string> swearWords = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void GetSwearWords()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the path to the file that has the swear words listDi2015NewLine    string path = <File Path>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Open the text fileDi2015NewLine    TextReader reader = new StreamReader(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Loop through each line in the file.Di2015NewLine    string line = "";Di2015NewLine    while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       // Lower cases word and removes whitespacesDi2015NewLine       string word = line.Trim().ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // Adds the word to the listDi2015NewLine       swearWords.Add(word);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11486686Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool HasSwearWord(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Splits words, removes whitespace and any punctuationDi2015NewLine    string[] wordArray = Regex.Split(text, @"\\W+");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check if any word in the string is a swear wordDi2015NewLine    foreach (string word in wordArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (swearWords.Contains(word.ToLower()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11487389Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Implements a left-leaning red-black tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine/// <remarks>Di2015NewLine/// Based on the research paper "Left-leaning Red-Black Trees"Di2015NewLine/// by Robert Sedgewick. More information available at:Di2015NewLine/// http://www.cs.princeton.edu/~rs/talks/LLRB/RedBlack.pdfDi2015NewLine/// http://www.cs.princeton.edu/~rs/talks/LLRB/08Penn.pdfDi2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TKey">Type of keys.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TValue">Type of values.</typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic class LeftLeaningRedBlackTree<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Stores the key comparison function.</summary>Di2015NewLine    private Comparison<TKey> _keyComparison;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Stores the value comparison function.</summary>Di2015NewLine    private Comparison<TValue> _valueComparison;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Stores the root node of the tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine    private Node _rootNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Represents a node of the tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Using fields instead of properties drops execution time by about 40%.</remarks>Di2015NewLine    [DebuggerDisplay("Key={Key}, Value={Value}, Siblings={Siblings}")]Di2015NewLine    private class NodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Gets or sets the node's key.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public TKey Key;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Gets or sets the node's value.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public TValue Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Gets or sets the left node.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public Node }Di2015NewLine        _keyComparison = keyComparison;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Initializes a new instance of the LeftLeaningRedBlackTree class implementing an {Di2015NewLine        if (null == valueComparison)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("valueComparison");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _valueComparison = valueComparison;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets a value indicating whether the tree is acting as an ordered /// <summary>Adds a key/value pair to the tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key">Key to add.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">Value to add.</param>Di2015NewLine    public AssertInvariants();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Removes a key (and its associated value) from a normal (non-multi) dictionary.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param (IsMultiDictionary)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Remove is only supported when acting as a normal (non-multi) dictionary.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Remove(key, default(TValue));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Removes a key/value pair from the tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param bool Remove(TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int initialCount = Count;Di2015NewLine        if (null != _rootNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _rootNode = Remove(_rootNode, key, value);Di2015NewLine            if (null != _rootNode)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _rootNode.IsBlack = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        AssertInvariants();Di2015NewLine        return initialCount != Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Removes all nodes in the }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets a sorted list of keys in the tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Sorted list of keys.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<TKey> GetKeys()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TKey lastKey = default(TKey);Di2015NewLine        bool lastKeyValid = false;Di2015NewLine        return Traverse(Di2015NewLine            _rootNode,Di2015NewLine            n => !lastKeyValid || !object.Equals(lastKey, n.Key),Di2015NewLine            n =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lastKey = n.Key;Di2015NewLine                lastKeyValid = true;Di2015NewLine                return lastKey;Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets the InvalidOperationException("GetValueForKey is only supported when acting as a normal (non-multi) dictionary.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Node node = GetNodeForKey(key);Di2015NewLine        if (null != node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return node.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new       return Traverse(GetNodeForKey(key), n => 0 == _keyComparison(n.Key, key), n => n.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets a sequence of all the values in the
