Traverse(_rootNode, n => true, n => n.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets the count of key/value pairs in the tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public int Count { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets the minimum key in the tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public TKey MinimumKeyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return GetExtreme(_rootNode, n => n.Left, n => n.Key); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets the maximum key in the tree.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public TKey MaximumKeyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return GetExtreme(_rootNode, n => n.Right, n => n.Key); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Returns true if the specified node is red.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Specified node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>True if specified node is red.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static bool IsRed(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (null == node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // "Virtual" leaf nodes are always blackDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return !node.IsBlack;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Adds the specified key/value pair below the specified root node.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Specified node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key">Key to add.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">Value to add.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>New root node.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private Node Add(Node node, TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (null == node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Insert new nodeDi2015NewLine            Count++;Di2015NewLine            return new Node { Key = key, Value = value };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsRed(node.Left) && IsRed(node.Right))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Split node with two red childrenDi2015NewLine            FlipColor(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find right place for new nodeDi2015NewLine        int comparisonResult = KeyAndValueComparison(key, value, node.Key, node.Value);Di2015NewLine        if (comparisonResult < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.Left = Add(node.Left, key, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (0 < comparisonResult)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.Right = Add(node.Right, key, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsMultiDictionary)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Store the presence of a "duplicate" nodeDi2015NewLine                node.Siblings++;Di2015NewLine                Count++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Replace the value of the existing nodeDi2015NewLine                node.Value = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsRed(node.Right))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Rotate to prevent red node on rightDi2015NewLine            node = RotateLeft(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsRed(node.Left) && IsRed(node.Left.Left))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Rotate to prevent consecutive red nodesDi2015NewLine            node = RotateRight(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Removes the specified key/value pair from below the specified node.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Specified node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key">Key to remove.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">Value to remove.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>True if key/value present and removed.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private Node Remove(Node node, TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int comparisonResult = KeyAndValueComparison(key, value, node.Key, node.Value);Di2015NewLine        if (comparisonResult < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // * Continue search if left is presentDi2015NewLine            if (null != node.Left)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!IsRed(node.Left) && !IsRed(node.Left.Left))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Move a red node overDi2015NewLine                    node = MoveRedLeft(node);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Remove from leftDi2015NewLine                node.Left = Remove(node.Left, key, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsRed(node.Left))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Flip a 3 node or unbalance a 4 nodeDi2015NewLine                node = RotateRight(node);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if ((0 == KeyAndValueComparison(key, value, node.Key, node.Value)) && (null == node.Right))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Remove leaf nodeDi2015NewLine                Debug.Assert(null == node.Left, "About to remove an extra node.");Di2015NewLine                Count--;Di2015NewLine                if (0 < node.Siblings)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Record the removal of the "duplicate" nodeDi2015NewLine                    Debug.Assert(IsMultiDictionary, "Should not have siblings if tree is not a multi-dictionary.");Di2015NewLine                    node.Siblings--;Di2015NewLine                    return node;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Leaf node is goneDi2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // * Continue search if right is presentDi2015NewLine            if (null != node.Right)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!IsRed(node.Right) && !IsRed(node.Right.Left))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Move a red node overDi2015NewLine                    node = MoveRedRight(node);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (0 == KeyAndValueComparison(key, value, node.Key, node.Value))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Remove leaf nodeDi2015NewLine                    Count--;Di2015NewLine                    if (0 < node.Siblings)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Record the removal of the "duplicate" nodeDi2015NewLine                        Debug.Assert(IsMultiDictionary, "Should not have siblings if tree is not a multi-dictionary.");Di2015NewLine                        node.Siblings--;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Find the smallest node on the right, swap, and remove itDi2015NewLine                        Node m = GetExtreme(node.Right, n => n.Left, n => n);Di2015NewLine                        node.Key = m.Key;Di2015NewLine                        node.Value = m.Value;Di2015NewLine                        node.Siblings = m.Siblings;Di2015NewLine                        node.Right = DeleteMinimum(node.Right);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Remove from rightDi2015NewLine                    node.Right = Remove(node.Right, key, value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Maintain invariantsDi2015NewLine        return FixUp(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Flip the colors of the specified node and its direct children.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Specified node.</param>Di2015NewLine    private static void FlipColor(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        node.IsBlack = !node.IsBlack;Di2015NewLine        node.Left.IsBlack = !node.Left.IsBlack;Di2015NewLine        node.Right.IsBlack = !node.Right.IsBlack;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Rotate the specified node "left".</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Specified node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>New root node.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static Node RotateLeft(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Node x = node.Right;Di2015NewLine        node.Right = x.Left;Di2015NewLine        x.Left = node;Di2015NewLine        x.IsBlack = node.IsBlack;Di2015NewLine        node.IsBlack = false;Di2015NewLine        return x;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Rotate the specified node "right".</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Specified node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>New root node.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static Node RotateRight(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Node x = node.Left;Di2015NewLine        node.Left = x.Right;Di2015NewLine        x.Right = node;Di2015NewLine        x.IsBlack = node.IsBlack;Di2015NewLine        node.IsBlack = false;Di2015NewLine        return x;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Moves a red node from the right child to the left child.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Parent node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>New root node.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static Node MoveRedLeft(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FlipColor(node);Di2015NewLine        if (IsRed(node.Right.Left))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.Right = RotateRight(node.Right);Di2015NewLine            node = RotateLeft(node);Di2015NewLine            FlipColor(node);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // * Avoid creating right-leaning nodesDi2015NewLine            if (IsRed(node.Right.Right))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                node.Right = RotateLeft(node.Right);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Moves a red node from the left child to the right child.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Parent node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>New root node.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static Node MoveRedRight(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FlipColor(node);Di2015NewLine        if (IsRed(node.Left.Left))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node = RotateRight(node);Di2015NewLine            FlipColor(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Deletes the minimum node under the specified node.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Specified node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>New root node.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private Node DeleteMinimum(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (null == node.Left)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Nothing to doDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!IsRed(node.Left) && !IsRed(node.Left.Left))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Move red node leftDi2015NewLine            node = MoveRedLeft(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Recursively deleteDi2015NewLine        node.Left = DeleteMinimum(node.Left);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Maintain invariantsDi2015NewLine        return FixUp(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Maintains invariants by adjusting the specified nodes children.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Specified node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>New root node.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static Node FixUp(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (IsRed(node.Right))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Avoid right-leaning nodeDi2015NewLine            node = RotateLeft(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsRed(node.Left) && IsRed(node.Left.Left))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Balance 4-nodeDi2015NewLine            node = RotateRight(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsRed(node.Left) && IsRed(node.Right))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Push red upDi2015NewLine            FlipColor(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // * Avoid leaving behind right-leaning nodesDi2015NewLine        if ((null != node.Left) && IsRed(node.Left.Right) && !IsRed(node.Left.Left))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.Left = RotateLeft(node.Left);Di2015NewLine            if (IsRed(node.Left))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Balance 4-nodeDi2015NewLine                node = RotateRight(node);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets the (first) node corresponding to the specified key.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key">Key to search for.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Corresponding node or null if none found.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private Node GetNodeForKey(TKey key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // InitializeDi2015NewLine        Node node = _rootNode;Di2015NewLine        while (null != node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Compare keys and go left/rightDi2015NewLine            int comparisonResult = _keyComparison(key, node.Key);Di2015NewLine            if (comparisonResult < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                node = node.Left;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (0 < comparisonResult)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                node = node.Right;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Match; return nodeDi2015NewLine                return node;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // No match foundDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets an extreme (ex: minimum/maximum) value.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Type of value.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Node to start from.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="successor">Successor function.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="selector">Selector function.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Extreme value.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static T GetExtreme<T>(Node node, Func<Node, Node> successor, Func<Node, T> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // InitializeDi2015NewLine        T extreme = default(T);Di2015NewLine        Node current = node;Di2015NewLine        while (null != current)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Go to extremeDi2015NewLine            extreme = selector(current);Di2015NewLine            current = successor(current);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return extreme;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Traverses a subset of the sequence of nodes in order and selects the specified nodes.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Type of elements.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">Starting node.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="condition">Condition method.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="selector">Selector method.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Sequence of selected nodes.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<T> Traverse<T>(Node node, Func<Node, bool> condition, Func<Node, T> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a stack to avoid recursionDi2015NewLine        Stack<Node> stack = new Stack<Node>();Di2015NewLine        Node current = node;Di2015NewLine        while (null != current)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (null != current.Left)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Save current state and go leftDi2015NewLine                stack.Push(current);Di2015NewLine                current = current.Left;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i <= current.Siblings; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Select current node if relevantDi2015NewLine                        if (condition(current))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            yield return selector(current);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    // Go right - or up if nothing to the rightDi2015NewLine                    current = current.Right;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while ((null == current) &&Di2015NewLine                       (0 < stack.Count) &&Di2015NewLine                       (null != (current = stack.Pop())));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Compares the specified keys (primary) and values (secondary).</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="leftKey">The left key.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="leftValue">The left value.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rightKey">The right key.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rightValue">The right value.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>CompareTo-style results: -1 if left is less, 0 if equal, and 1 if greater than right.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private int KeyAndValueComparison(TKey leftKey, TValue leftValue, TKey rightKey, TValue rightValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Compare keysDi2015NewLine        int comparisonResult = _keyComparison(leftKey, rightKey);Di2015NewLine        if ((0 == comparisonResult) && (null != _valueComparison))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Keys match; compare valuesDi2015NewLine            comparisonResult = _valueComparison(leftValue, rightValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return comparisonResult;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Asserts that tree invariants are not violated.</summary>Di2015NewLine    [Conditional("Debug")]Di2015NewLine    private void AssertInvariants()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Root is blackDi2015NewLine        Debug.Assert((null == _rootNode) || _rootNode.IsBlack, "Root is not black");Di2015NewLine        // Every path contains the same number of black nodesDi2015NewLine        Dictionary<Node, Node> parents = new Dictionary<LeftLeaningRedBlackTree<TKey, TValue>.Node, LeftLeaningRedBlackTree<TKey, TValue>.Node>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (Node node in Traverse(_rootNode, n => true, n => n))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (null != node.Left)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                parents[node.Left] = node;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (null != node.Right)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                parents[node.Right] = node;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (null != _rootNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parents[_rootNode] = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int treeCount = -1;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Node node in Traverse(_rootNode, n => (null == n.Left) || (null == n.Right), n => n))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int pathCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            Node current = node;Di2015NewLine            while (null != current)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (current.IsBlack)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pathCount++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                current = parents[current];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert((-1 == treeCount) || (pathCount == treeCount), "Not all paths have the same number of black nodes.");Di2015NewLine            treeCount = pathCount;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Verify node properties...Di2015NewLine        foreach (Node node in Traverse(_rootNode, n => true, n => n))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Left node is lessDi2015NewLine            if (null != node.Left)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Debug.Assert(0 > KeyAndValueComparison(node.Left.Key, node.Left.Value, node.Key, node.Value), "Left node is greater than its parent.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Right node is greaterDi2015NewLine            if (null != node.Right)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Debug.Assert(0 < KeyAndValueComparison(node.Right.Key, node.Right.Value, node.Key, node.Value), "Right node is less than its parent.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Both children of a red node are blackDi2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(!IsRed(node) || (!IsRed(node.Left) && !IsRed(node.Right)), "Red node has a red child.");Di2015NewLine            // Always left-leaningDi2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(!IsRed(node.Right) || IsRed(node.Left), "Node is not left-leaning.");Di2015NewLine            // No consecutive reds (subset of previous rule)Di2015NewLine            //Debug.Assert(!(IsRed(node) && IsRed(node.Left)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11487408Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetModelToValidateInClassScope
11487408Di2015UniqueSeparatorPropertyInfo GetModelToValidateInClassScope(Type attributeType, MethodInfo methodInfo, out object instance)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // same implementation as before ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // assign the model to use, Di2015NewLine   // which is likely accessible from somewhere in the is methodDi2015NewLine   instance = theModelInstanceFromThisMethod;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // .. or if the property is static, then uncomment the next line:Di2015NewLine   // instance = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // same return value as before ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11487408Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetModelToValidateInClassScope
11487408Di2015UniqueSeparatorValidateModel

11488222Di2015UniqueSeparatorgetPagePos
11488222Di2015UniqueSeparator(float)cx * tileSize / (float)(xlim - 1) + pagePos.x
11488222Di2015UniqueSeparatorxLim
11488222Di2015UniqueSeparatortileSize
11488222Di2015UniqueSeparatortileSize / xLim
11488222Di2015UniqueSeparator    return new Vector2( Di2015NewLine        tileSize * (float)x,Di2015NewLine        0.0fDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine
11488222Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected Vector2 getPagePos(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float halfTile = loadSquares / 2.0f;Di2015NewLine    return new Vector2( Di2015NewLine        (-halfTile * tileSize) + (x * tileSize),Di2015NewLine        (-halfTile * tileSize) + (y * tileSize)Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void generate(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(x >= loadSquares || x < 0 || y >= loadSquares || y < 0) return;Di2015NewLine    t[x,y] = Terrain.CreateTerrainGameObject(new TerrainData()).GetComponent<Terrain>();Di2015NewLine    t[x,y].name = "Terrain [" + x + "," + y + "]";Di2015NewLine    td[x,y] = t[x,y].terrainData;Di2015NewLine    td[x,y].heightmapResolution = resolution;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tr[x,y] = t[x,y].transform;Di2015NewLine    Vector2 pagePos = getPagePos(x, y);Di2015NewLine    //Actual data generation happens here.Di2015NewLine    int xLim = td[x,y].heightmapWidth;Di2015NewLine    int yLim = td[x,y].heightmapHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float[,] array = new float[xLim, yLim];Di2015NewLine    float min = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    float max = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLine    for(int cx = 0; cx < xLim; cx++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int cy = 0; cy < yLim; cy++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            array[cx,cy] = sample(Di2015NewLine                new Vector3(Di2015NewLine                    (float)cx * (tileSize / (float)(xLim - 1)) + pagePos.x, Di2015NewLine                    0.0f,Di2015NewLine                    (float)cy * (tileSize / (float)(yLim - 1)) + pagePos.yDi2015NewLine                ) Di2015NewLine            ); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(min > array[cx,cy]) Di2015NewLine                min = array[cx,cy];Di2015NewLine            if(max < array[cx,cy]) Di2015NewLine                max = array[cx,cy];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Set up the Terrain object to receive the dataDi2015NewLine    float diff = max != min ? max - min : 10.0f;Di2015NewLine    tr[x,y].position = new Vector3(pagePos.y, min, pagePos.x);Di2015NewLine    td[x,y].size = new Vector3(tileSize, diff, tileSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Convert the data to fit in the Terrain objectDi2015NewLine    for(int cx = 0; cx < xLim; cx++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int cy = 0; cy < yLim; cy++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            array[cx,cy] -= min;Di2015NewLine            array[cx,cy] /= diff;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Set the data in the Terrain objectDi2015NewLine    td[x,y].SetHeights(0, 0, array);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11497674Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing UnityEngine;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ViewDrag : MonoBehaviour {Di2015NewLineVector3 hit_position = Vector3.zero;Di2015NewLineVector3 current_position = Vector3.zero;Di2015NewLineVector3 camera_position = Vector3.zero;Di2015NewLinefloat z = 0.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Use this for initializationDi2015NewLinevoid Start () {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Update(){Di2015NewLine    if(Input.GetMouseButtonDown(0)){Di2015NewLine        hit_position = Input.mousePosition;Di2015NewLine        camera_position = transform.position;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(Input.GetMouseButton(0)){Di2015NewLine        current_position = Input.mousePosition;Di2015NewLine        LeftMouseDrag();        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid LeftMouseDrag(){Di2015NewLine    // From the Unity3D docs: "The z position is in world units from the camera."  In my case I'm using the y-axis as heightDi2015NewLine    // with my camera facing back down the y-axis.  You can ignore this when the camera is orthograhic.Di2015NewLine    current_position.z = hit_position.z = camera_position.y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get direction of movement.  (Note: Don't normalize, the magnitude of change is going to be Vector3.Distance(current_position-hit_position)Di2015NewLine    // anyways.  Di2015NewLine    Vector3 direction = Camera.main.ScreenToWorldPoint(current_position) - Camera.main.ScreenToWorldPoint(hit_position);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Invert direction to that terrain appears to move with the mouse.Di2015NewLine    direction = direction * -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector3 position = camera_position + direction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    transform.position = position;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11497852Di2015UniqueSeparator        var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var data = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //As long as the first 8 bytes are the long, the byte[] can be as long as you want.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine            data.Add(BitConverter.GetBytes((ulong)rnd.Next()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Without any 'deserialisation'Di2015NewLine        if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)Di2015NewLine            data = data.OrderBy(x => x[7]).ThenBy(x => x[6]).ThenBy(x => x[5]).ThenBy(x => x[4]).ThenBy(x => x[3]).ThenBy(x => x[2]).ThenBy(x => x[1]).ThenBy(x => x[0]).ToList();Di2015NewLine        else  //untested, probably wrongDi2015NewLine            data = data.OrderBy(x => x[0]).ThenBy(x => x[1]).ThenBy(x => x[2]).ThenBy(x => x[3]).ThenBy(x => x[4]).ThenBy(x => x[5]).ThenBy(x => x[6]).ThenBy(x => x[7]).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //How I'd actually approach it due to simplicity.Di2015NewLine        //data = data.OrderBy(x => BitConverter.ToUInt64(x, 0)).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        data.ForEach(x => Console.WriteLine(BitConverter.ToUInt64(x, 0)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //There are other approaches of course, but at the fundamental level you're Di2015NewLine        //either going to 'deserialize' the long or test each byte in order.Di2015NewLine

};Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void item_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_previouslySelectedElement == null) return;Di2015NewLine    //simply replace selected text in previously focused textbox with whatever is in tag propertyDi2015NewLine    var button = (Button)sender;Di2015NewLine    var textToInsert = (string)button.Tag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _previouslySelectedElement.Text = _previouslySelectedElement.Text.Substring(0, _selectionStart)Di2015NewLine        + textToInsert +Di2015NewLine textboxes loose their focus note that thisDi2015NewLine    //might not be fired by button clickDi2015NewLine    _previouslySelectedElement = (TextBox)sender;Di2015NewLine    _selectionStart = _previouslySelectedElement.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine    _selectionLength = _previouslySelectedElement.SelectionLength;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic List<TChild> childCount = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < childCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DependencyObject o = FindChildren<TChild>(o))Di2015NewLine            children.Add(c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return children;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11500177Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<employee> FindPaging(string job, int startIndex, int pageSize, string sortColumn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var c = new DataClassesDataContext();Di2015NewLine        var sort = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sortColumn) || sortColumn == "sortColumn")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sort = "fname";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sort = sortColumn.Replace("sortColumn ", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine            sort = sort.Replace(" DESC", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var q = c.employees.Where(x => x.job_id.ToString() == job).Skip(startIndex).Take(pageSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!sortColumn.Contains("DESC"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return q.OrderBy(sort);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return q.OrderByDescending(sort);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int FindPagingCount(string job, int startIndex, int pageSize, string sortColumn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var c = new DataClassesDataContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return c.employees.Where(x => x.job_id.ToString() == job).Count();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11500386Di2015UniqueSeparatorset @cDos_TotalCalls = @cDos_TotalCalls + @NewCallsCounterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @cMilSecDif = ABS(DATEDIFF(millisecond, @FirstDate, @UtpNow))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- I left 6sec diferent to make the calculationDi2015NewLineIF @cMilSecDif > 6000Di2015NewLine    SET @cClickPerSeconds = (@cDos_TotalCalls * 1000 / @cMilSecDif)Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine    SET @cClickPerSeconds = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIF @cMilSecDif > 30000Di2015NewLine    UPDATE ATMP_LiveUserInfo SET cDos_TotalCalls = @NewCallsCounter, cDos_TotalCallsChecksOn = @UtpNow WHERE cLiveUsersID=@cLiveUsersID         Di2015NewLineELSE IF @cMilSecDif > 16000Di2015NewLine    UPDATE ATMP_LiveUserInfo SET cDos_TotalCalls = (cDos_TotalCalls / 2), Di2015NewLine    cDos_TotalCallsChecksOn = DATEADD(millisecond, @cMilSecDif / 2, cDos_TotalCallsChecksOn)Di2015NewLine        WHERE cLiveUsersID=@cLiveUsersIDDi2015NewLine

11501248Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CustomTreeView : TreeViewDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public const int NOIMAGE = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomTreeView()Di2015NewLine        : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // .NET Bug: Unless LineColor is set, Win32 treeview returns -1 (default), .NET returns Color.Black!Di2015NewLine        base.LineColor = SystemColors.GrayText;Di2015NewLine        base.DrawMode = TreeViewDrawMode.OwnerDrawAll;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnDrawNode(DrawTreeNodeEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Space between Image and Label.Di2015NewLine        const int SPACE_IL = 3;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // We only do additional drawing.Di2015NewLine        e.DrawDefault = true;Di2015NewLine        base.OnDrawNode(e);Di2015NewLine        if (base.ShowLines && base.ImageList != null && e.Node.ImageIndex == NOIMAGEDi2015NewLine            // exclude root nodes, if root lines are disabledDi2015NewLine            //&& (base.ShowRootLines || e.Node.Level > 0))Di2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Using lines & images, but this node has none: fill up missing treelinesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Image sizeDi2015NewLine            int imgW = base.ImageList.ImageSize.Width;Di2015NewLine            int imgH = base.ImageList.ImageSize.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Image centerDi2015NewLine            int xPos = e.Node.Bounds.Left - SPACE_IL - imgW / 2;Di2015NewLine            int yPos = (e.Node.Bounds.Top + e.Node.Bounds.Bottom) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Image rectDi2015NewLine            Rectangle imgRect = new Rectangle(xPos, yPos, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            imgRect.Inflate(imgW / 2, imgH / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Pen p = new Pen(base.LineColor, 1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p.DashStyle = DashStyle.Dot;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Account uneven Indent for both lines.Di2015NewLine                p.DashOffset = base.Indent % 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Horizontal treeline across width of imageDi2015NewLine                // account uneven half of delta ItemHeight & ImageHeight.Di2015NewLine                int yHor = yPos + ((base.ItemHeight - imgRect.Height) / 2) % 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //if (base.ShowRootLines || e.Node.Level > 0)Di2015NewLine                //{Di2015NewLine                //    e.Graphics.DrawLine(p, imgRect.Left, yHor, imgRect.Right, yHor);Di2015NewLine                //}Di2015NewLine                //elseDi2015NewLine                //{Di2015NewLine                //    // for root nodes, if root lines are disabled, start at centerDi2015NewLine                //    e.Graphics.DrawLine(p, xPos - (int)p.DashOffset, yHor, imgRect.Right, yHor);Di2015NewLine                //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                e.Graphics.DrawLine(p,Di2015NewLine                        (base.ShowRootLines || e.Node.Level > 0) ? imgRect.Left : xPos - (int)p.DashOffset,Di2015NewLine                        yHor, imgRect.Right, yHor);Di2015NewLine                if (!base.CheckBoxes && e.Node.IsExpanded)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Vertical treeline , offspring from NodeImage center to e.Node.Bounds.BottomDi2015NewLine                    // yStartPos: account uneven Indent and uneven half of delta ItemHeight & ImageHeightDi2015NewLine                    int yVer = yHor + (int)p.DashOffset;Di2015NewLine                    e.Graphics.DrawLine(p, xPos, yVer, xPos, e.Node.Bounds.Bottom);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnAfterCollapse(TreeViewEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnAfterCollapse(e);Di2015NewLine        if (!base.CheckBoxes && base.ImageList != null && e.Node.ImageIndex == NOIMAGE)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // DrawNode event not raised: redraw node with collapsed treelineDi2015NewLine            base.Invalidate(e.Node.Bounds);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11503055Di2015UniqueSeparatordata
11503055Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap ConvertTo1Bit(Bitmap input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var masks = new byte[] { 0x80, 0x40, 0x20, 0x10, 0x08, 0x04, 0x02, 0x01 };Di2015NewLine    var output = new Bitmap(input.Width, input.Height, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLine    var data = new sbyte[input.Width, input.Height];Di2015NewLine    var inputData = input.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, input.Width, input.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var scanLine = inputData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        var line = new byte[inputData.Stride];Di2015NewLine        for (var y = 0; y < inputData.Height; y++, scanLine += inputData.Stride)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(scanLine, line, 0, line.Length);Di2015NewLine            for (var x = 0; x < input.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data[x, y] = (sbyte)(64 * (GetGreyLevel(line[x * 3 + 2], line[x * 3 + 1], line[x * 3 + 0]) - 0.5));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        input.UnlockBits(inputData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var outputData = output.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, output.Width, output.Height), ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var scanLine = outputData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        for (var y = 0; y < outputData.Height; y++, scanLine += outputData.Stride)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var line = new byte[outputData.Stride];Di2015NewLine            for (var x = 0; x < input.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var j = data[x, y] > 0;Di2015NewLine                if (j) line[x / 8] |= masks[x % 8];Di2015NewLine                var error = (sbyte)(data[x, y] - (j ? 32 : -32));Di2015NewLine                if (x < input.Width - 1) data[x + 1, y] += (sbyte)(7 * error / 16);Di2015NewLine                if (y < input.Height - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (x > 0) data[x - 1, y + 1] += (sbyte)(3 * error / 16);Di2015NewLine                    data[x, y + 1] += (sbyte)(5 * error / 16);Di2015NewLine                    if (x < input.Width - 1) data[x + 1, y + 1] += (sbyte)(1 * error / 16);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(line, 0, scanLine, outputData.Stride);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        output.UnlockBits(outputData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return output;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static double GetGreyLevel(byte r, byte g, byte b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (r * 0.299 + g * 0.587 + b * 0.114) / 255;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11503068Di2015UniqueSeparator[ValueConversion(typeof(int), typeof(string))]Di2015NewLinepublic class IntegerConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int intValue = (int)value;Di2015NewLine        return intValue != 0 ? intValue.ToString() : string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int intValue = 0;Di2015NewLine        int.TryParse((string)value, out intValue);Di2015NewLine        return intValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11505219Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Quaternion CreateFromYawPitchRoll(float yaw, float pitch, float roll)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float rollOver2 = roll * 0.5f;Di2015NewLine    float sinRollOver2 = (float)Math.Sin((double)rollOver2);Di2015NewLine    float cosRollOver2 = (float)Math.Cos((double)rollOver2);Di2015NewLine    float pitchOver2 = pitch * 0.5f;Di2015NewLine    float sinPitchOver2 = (float)Math.Sin((double)pitchOver2);Di2015NewLine    float cosPitchOver2 = (float)Math.Cos((double)pitchOver2);Di2015NewLine    float yawOver2 = yaw * 0.5f;Di2015NewLine    float sinYawOver2 = (float)Math.Sin((double)yawOver2);Di2015NewLine    float cosYawOver2 = (float)Math.Cos((double)yawOver2);Di2015NewLine    Quaternion result;Di2015NewLine    result.X = cosYawOver2 * cosPitchOver2 * cosRollOver2 + sinYawOver2 * sinPitchOver2 * sinRollOver2;Di2015NewLine    result.Y = cosYawOver2 * cosPitchOver2 * sinRollOver2 - sinYawOver2 * sinPitchOver2 * cosRollOver2;Di2015NewLine    result.Z = cosYawOver2 * sinPitchOver2 * cosRollOver2 + sinYawOver2 * cosPitchOver2 * sinRollOver2;Di2015NewLine    result.W = sinYawOver2 * cosPitchOver2 * cosRollOver2 - cosYawOver2 * sinPitchOver2 * sinRollOver2;Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
11505219Di2015UniqueSeparatorToEulerAngles
11505219Di2015UniqueSeparatorpitchYawRoll.Y = (float)Math.Atan2(2f * q.X * q.W + 2f * q.Y * q.Z, 1 - 2f * (sqz  + sqw));     // Yaw Di2015NewLinepitchYawRoll.X = (float)Math.Asin(2f * ( q.X * q.Z - q.W * q.Y ) );                             // Pitch Di2015NewLinepitchYawRoll.Z = (float)Math.Atan2(2f * q.X * q.Y + 2f * q.Z * q.W, 1 - 2f * (sqy + sqz));      // Roll Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                dr.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex) { Console.WriteLine(ex.Message); }Di2015NewLine            finally { cn.Close(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //process/present results at this pointDi2015NewLine        //for each result in list with freq >= 3, output to gridDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<Component> rowsWithThreeHits = results.Where(cFreq => int.Equals(cFreq.Frequency, 3))Di2015NewLine            .Select(x => new Component { CompoundID = x.CompoundID, Component1 = x.Component1, Di2015NewLine                Component2 = x.Component2, Component3 = x.Component3, CompoundValue = x.CompoundValue });Di2015NewLine        List<Component> final = new List<Component>(rowsWithThreeHits);Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.DataSource = final;Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ComponentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int CompoundID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Component1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Component2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Component3 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int CompoundValue { get; Di2015NewLine        Component1 = component1;Di2015NewLine        Component2 = component2;Di2015NewLine        Component3 = component3;Di2015NewLine        CompoundValue = compoundValue;Di2015NewLine        Frequency = 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11523014Di2015UniqueSeparatormWebClient.DownloadProgressChanged += (sender, e) => progressChanged(e.BytesReceived);Di2015NewLine//...Di2015NewLineDateTime lastUpdate;Di2015NewLinelong lastBytes = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void progressChanged(long bytes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (lastBytes == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lastUpdate = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            lastBytes = bytes;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        var timeSpan = now - lastUpdate;Di2015NewLine        var bytesChange = bytes - lastBytes;Di2015NewLine        var bytesPerSecond = bytesChange / timeSpan.Seconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lastBytes = bytes;Di2015NewLine        lastUpdate = now;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11523253Di2015UniqueSeparator[TestMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void SomeBenchmark()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<double> forLoopTimes = new List<double>();Di2015NewLine    List<double> forLoop2Times = new List<double>();Di2015NewLine    List<double> toDictionaryTimes = new List<double>();Di2015NewLine    List<double> hybridTimes = new List<double>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[] array = Enumerable.Range(0, 5000).Select(i => i.ToString()).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<int, string> dictionary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int runCount = 5000;Di2015NewLine    int arrayLen = array.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (runCount-- != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        dictionary = new Dictionary<int, string>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dictionary[i] = array[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        forLoopTimes.Add(sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        dictionary = new Dictionary<int, string>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < arrayLen; i++)Di2015NewLine        {   //same as before - but using arrayLen instead of propertyDi2015NewLine            dictionary[i] = array[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        forLoop2Times.Add(sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        dictionary = array.Select((s, i) => new { Key = i, Value = s }).ToDictionary(v => v.Key, v => v.Value);Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        toDictionaryTimes.Add(sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int counter = 0;Di2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        dictionary = array.ToDictionary(s => counter++, s => s);Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        hybridTimes.Add(sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("for loop average: {0} milliseconds", forLoopTimes.Average());Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("for loop(2) average: {0} milliseconds", forLoop2Times.Average());Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("ToDictionary average: {0} milliseconds", toDictionaryTimes.Average());Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Hybrid average: {0} milliseconds", hybridTimes.Average());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Remove(int key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryGetValue(int key, out string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        value = null;Di2015NewLine        if (key >= 0 && key < _array.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = _array[key];Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ICollection<string> ValuesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _array; 11523801Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ShelfCacheDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Shelf Data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ShelfCache()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Data = new Shelf();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Write(string Filename)Di2015NewLine    {           Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer CacheSerializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(Shelf));Di2015NewLine        TextWriter CacheWriter = new StreamWriter(Filename);Di2015NewLine        CacheSerializer.Serialize(CacheWriter, Data);Di2015NewLine        CacheWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine        CacheWriter.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Read(string Filename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Data = new Shelf();Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer CacheSerializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(Shelf));Di2015NewLine        TextReader CacheReader = new StreamReader(Filename);Di2015NewLine        Data = (Shelf)CacheSerializer.Deserialize(CacheReader);Di2015NewLine        CacheReader.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteEncrypted(string Filename, string EncryptionKey = "")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string TempFile = System.IO.Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLine        Write(TempFile);Di2015NewLine        EncryptFile(TempFile, Filename, EncryptionKey);Di2015NewLine        File.Delete(TempFile);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ReadEncrypted(string Filename, string EncryptionKey = "")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string TempFile = System.IO.Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLine        DecryptFile(Filename, TempFile, EncryptionKey);Di2015NewLine        Read(TempFile);Di2015NewLine        File.Delete(TempFile);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private RijndaelManaged GetEncryptor(string Key = "", string Salt = "")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Key += Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables("%USERNAME%");Di2015NewLine        Salt += Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables("%COMPUTERNAME%");Di2015NewLine        Rfc2898DeriveBytes derivedKey = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(Key, Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(Salt));Di2015NewLine        RijndaelManaged rijndaelCSP = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine        rijndaelCSP.Key = derivedKey.GetBytes(rijndaelCSP.KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLine        rijndaelCSP.IV = derivedKey.GetBytes(rijndaelCSP.BlockSize / 8);Di2015NewLine        return rijndaelCSP;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void EncryptFile(string Source, string Target, string EncryptionKey)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RijndaelManaged EncryptionProvider = GetEncryptor(EncryptionKey);Di2015NewLine        ICryptoTransform Encryptor = EncryptionProvider.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FileStream SourceStream = new FileStream(Source, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.ReadWrite);Di2015NewLine        byte[] SourceBytes = new byte[(int)SourceStream.Length];Di2015NewLine        SourceStream.Read(SourceBytes, 0, (int)SourceStream.Length);Di2015NewLine        FileStream TargetStream = new FileStream(Target, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine        CryptoStream EncryptionStream = new CryptoStream(TargetStream, Encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine        EncryptionStream.Write(SourceBytes, 0, (int)SourceStream.Length);Di2015NewLine        EncryptionStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EncryptionProvider.Clear();Di2015NewLine        EncryptionStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        SourceStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        TargetStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DecryptFile(string Source, string Target, string EncryptionKey)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RijndaelManaged EncryptionProvider = GetEncryptor(EncryptionKey);Di2015NewLine        ICryptoTransform Decryptor = EncryptionProvider.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FileStream SourceStream = new FileStream(Source, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine        CryptoStream DecryptionStream = new CryptoStream(SourceStream, Decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read);Di2015NewLine        byte[] SourceBytes = new byte[(int)SourceStream.Length];Di2015NewLine        int DecryptionLength = DecryptionStream.Read(SourceBytes, 0, (int)SourceStream.Length);Di2015NewLine        FileStream TargetStream = new FileStream(Target, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine        TargetStream.Write(SourceBytes, 0, DecryptionLength);Di2015NewLine        TargetStream.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        EncryptionProvider.Clear();Di2015NewLine        DecryptionStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        SourceStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        TargetStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11531217Di2015UniqueSeparator    private List<TreeNode> CurrentNodeMatches = new List<TreeNode>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int LastNodeIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string LastSearchText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string searchText = this.textBox1.Text;Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(searchText))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (LastSearchText != searchText)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //It's a new SearchDi2015NewLine            CurrentNodeMatches.Clear();Di2015NewLine            LastSearchText = searchText;Di2015NewLine            LastNodeIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            SearchNodes(searchText, treeView1.Nodes[0]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (LastNodeIndex >= 0 && CurrentNodeMatches.Count > 0 && LastNodeIndex < CurrentNodeMatches.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode selectedNode = CurrentNodeMatches[LastNodeIndex];Di2015NewLine            LastNodeIndex++;Di2015NewLine            this.treeView1.SelectedNode = selectedNode;Di2015NewLine            this.treeView1.SelectedNode.Expand();Di2015NewLine            this.treeView1.Select();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SearchNodes(string SearchText, TreeNode StartNode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode node = null;Di2015NewLine        while (StartNode != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (StartNode.Text.ToLower().Contains(SearchText.ToLower()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CurrentNodeMatches.Add(StartNode);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            if (StartNode.Nodes.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SearchNodes(SearchText, StartNode.Nodes[0]);//Recursive Search Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            StartNode = StartNode.NextNode;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11531392Di2015UniqueSeparatorMove
11531392Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int WM_MOVING = 0x216;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void WriteTheRect(IntPtr dest, Rectangle rect) {Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.WriteInt32(dest, 0, rect.Left);Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.WriteInt32(dest, 4, rect.Top);Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.WriteInt32(dest, 8, rect.Right);Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.WriteInt32(dest, 12, rect.Bottom);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void WndProc(ref Message m) {Di2015NewLine    if (m.Msg == WM_MOVING)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // RECT structure pointed to by lParam: left, top, right, bottomDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rectangle r = Rectangle.FromLTRB(System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadInt32(m.LParam, 0),Di2015NewLine                                         System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadInt32(m.LParam, 4),Di2015NewLine                                         System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadInt32(m.LParam, 8),Di2015NewLine                                         System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadInt32(m.LParam, 12)Di2015NewLine                                         );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rectangle allowed = Rectangle.FromLTRB(0, 0, 1600, 900);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (r.Left <= allowed.Left || r.Top <= allowed.Top || r.Right >= allowed.Right || r.Bottom >= allowed.Bottom)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int offset_x = r.Left < allowed.Left ? (allowed.Left - r.Left) : (r.Right > allowed.Right ? (allowed.Right - r.Right) : (0));Di2015NewLine            int offset_y = r.Top < allowed.Top ? (allowed.Top - r.Top) : (r.Bottom > allowed.Bottom ? (allowed.Bottom - r.Bottom) : (0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            r.Offset(offset_x, offset_y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WriteTheRect(m.LParam, r);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11539004Di2015UniqueSeparatorDim comPort As New SerialPort("COM15") 'New com port'Di2015NewLineDim terminatingChar As Char = Chr(10) 'Terminate at vbLF (new line)'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecomPort.BaudRate = 9600 '9600 baud speed'Di2015NewLinecomPort.Encoding = Encoding.ASCII 'Decode the bytes via ASCII code'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecomPort.Open() 'Open the port'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDim myBarcode as String = "" 'Current barcode is empty'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWhile True'Read chars until the terminating char appears'Di2015NewLine    Dim tempChar as Char = Convert.ToChar(comPort.ReadChar()) 'Read a char'Di2015NewLine    If tempChar = terminatingChar Then Exit While 'If its the terminating char, exit the loop'Di2015NewLine    myBarcode = myBarcode & tempChar 'If not append it to the barcode string'Di2015NewLineEnd WhileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecomPort.Close() '(!) Close the port'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(myBarcode.Trim()) 'Trim it and show it to the user'Di2015NewLine

11543377Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GlobalErrorHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void HandleError(HttpContext context, Exception ex, Controller controller)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LogException(ex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.Response.StatusCode = GetStatusCode(ex);Di2015NewLine        context.ClearError();Di2015NewLine        context.Response.Clear();Di2015NewLine        context.Response.TrySkipIisCustomErrors = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsAjaxRequest(context.Request))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReturnErrorJson(context, ex);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ReturnErrorView(context, ex, controller);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void LogException(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // log the exceptionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ReturnErrorView(HttpContext context, Exception ex, Controller controller)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var routeData = new RouteData();Di2015NewLine        routeData.Values["controller"] = "Error";Di2015NewLine        routeData.Values["action"] = GetActionName(GetStatusCode(ex));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        controller.ViewData.Model = new HandleErrorInfo(ex, " ", " ");Di2015NewLine        ((IController)controller).Execute(new RequestContext(new HttpContextWrapper(context), routeData));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ReturnErrorJson(HttpContext context, Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var json = string.Format(@"success: false, error:""{0}""", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        context.Response.ContentType = "application/json";Di2015NewLine        context.Response.Write("{" + json + "}");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int GetStatusCode(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ex is HttpException ? ((HttpException)ex).GetHttpCode() : 500;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsAjaxRequest(HttpRequest request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return request.Headers["X-Requested-With"] != null && request.Headers["X-Requested-With"] == "XMLHttpRequest";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetActionName(int statusCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string actionName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (statusCode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 404:Di2015NewLine                actionName = "NotFound";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case 400:Di2015NewLine                actionName = "InvalidRequest";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case 401:Di2015NewLine                actionName = "AccessDenied";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                actionName = "ServerError";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return actionName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsDebugDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool debug = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if DEBUGDi2015NewLine            debug = true;Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine            return debug;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

compiledSetter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        setter = compiledSetter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MappingParameter<TSource> Create<TResult>(Expression<Func<TSource, TResult>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var newValue = Expression.Parameter(expression.Body.Type);Di2015NewLine        var body = Expression.Assign(expression.Body, newValue);Di2015NewLine        var assign = Expression.Lambda(body, expression.Parameters[0], newValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var compiledSetter = assign.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new MappingParameter<TSource>(compiledSetter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Assign(TSource instance, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object convertedValue;Di2015NewLine        if (!setter.Method.ReturnType.IsAssignableFrom(typeof(string)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        setter.DynamicInvoke(instance, convertedValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class 11546932Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE TYPE item_drop_bulk_table_rev4 AS TABLE (Di2015NewLine    item_id BIGINT,Di2015NewLine    monster_class_id INT,Di2015NewLine    zone_id INT,Di2015NewLine    xpos REAL,Di2015NewLine    ypos REAL,Di2015NewLine    kill_time datetimeDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine
11546932Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE insert_item_drops_rev4Di2015NewLine    @mytable item_drop_bulk_table_rev4 READONLYDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBEGIN TRANSACTIONDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Lookup the current IDDi2015NewLineDECLARE @id_marker bigintDi2015NewLineSELECT @id_marker = MAX(primary_key_column) FROM item_drops_rev4 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Insert all the dataDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO item_drops_rev4 Di2015NewLine    (item_id, monster_class_id, zone_id, xpos, ypos, kill_time)Di2015NewLineSELECT Di2015NewLine    item_id, monster_class_id, zone_id, xpos, ypos, kill_time Di2015NewLineFROM Di2015NewLine    @mytableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Return back the identity valuesDi2015NewLineSELECT * FROM item_drops_rev4 WHERE primary_key_column > @id_markerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCOMMIT TRANSACTIONDi2015NewLine
11546932Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLinedt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("item_id", typeof(Int64)));Di2015NewLinedt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("monster_class_id", typeof(int)));Di2015NewLinedt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("zone_id", typeof(int)));Di2015NewLinedt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("xpos", typeof(float)));Di2015NewLinedt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("ypos", typeof(float)));Di2015NewLinedt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("timestamp", typeof(DateTime)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < MY_INSERT_SIZE; i++) {Di2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Add(new object[] { item_id, monster_class_id, zone_id, xpos, ypos, DateTime.Now });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now we're going to do all the work with one connection!Di2015NewLineusing (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(my_connection_string)) {Di2015NewLine    conn.Open();Di2015NewLine    using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand("insert_item_drops_rev4", conn)) {Di2015NewLine        cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Adding a "structured" parameter allows you to insert tons of data with low overheadDi2015NewLine        SqlParameter param = new SqlParameter("@mytable", SqlDbType.Structured);Di2015NewLine        param.Value = dt;Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.Add(param);Di2015NewLine        SqlDataReader dr = cmd.ExecuteReader()Di2015NewLine        // TODO: Read back in the objects, now attached to their primary keysDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11546952Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Calculates the absolute bone transformation matrices in model space</summary>Di2015NewLine    private void calculateAbsoluteBoneTransforms() {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Obtain the local transform for the bind pose of all bonesDi2015NewLine      this.model.CopyBoneTransformsTo(this.absoluteBoneTransforms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Convert the relative bone transforms into absolute transformsDi2015NewLine      ModelBoneCollection bones = this.model.Bones;Di2015NewLine      for (int index = 0; index < bones.Count; ++index) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Take over the bone transform and apply its user-specified transformationDi2015NewLine        this.absoluteBoneTransforms[index] =Di2015NewLine          this.boneTransforms[index] * bones[index].Transform;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Calculate the absolute transform of the bone in model space.Di2015NewLine        // Content processors sort bones so that parent bones always appearDi2015NewLine        // before their children, thus this works like a matrix stack,Di2015NewLine        // resolving the full bone hierarchy in minimal steps.Di2015NewLine        ModelBone bone = bones[index];Di2015NewLine        if (bone.Parent != null) {Di2015NewLine          int parentIndex = bone.Parent.Index;Di2015NewLine          this.absoluteBoneTransforms[index] *= this.absoluteBoneTransforms[parentIndex];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11547121Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass oscillatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private:Di2015NewLine    float min;Di2015NewLine    float max;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static float mod(float num, float div)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float ratio = num / div;Di2015NewLine        return div * (ratio - std::floor(ratio));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public:Di2015NewLine    oscillator(float a, float b)Di2015NewLine      : min(a < b ? a : b), max(a > b ? a : b) {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float range() ( return max-min; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float cycle_length() { return 2*range(); } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float normalize(float val)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float state = mod(val-min, cycle_length());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (state > range())Di2015NewLine            state = cycle_length()-state;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return state + min;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};

11547684Di2015UniqueSeparator[WebMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetProgressStatus(string ProcessID)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string completed_process = "0";Di2015NewLine    if (_lst.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (i = 0; i <= _lst.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_lst[i].vinfo.ProcessID == ProcessID)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                completed_process = Math.Round(_lst[i].vinfo.ProcessingCompleted, 2).ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return completed_process;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11547915Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate function dbo.FractionToFloat(@fraction varchar(100))Di2015NewLinereturns floatDi2015NewLineasDi2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine    declare @input varchar(100)Di2015NewLine        , @output floatDi2015NewLine        , @whole intDi2015NewLine        , @dividend intDi2015NewLine        , @divisor intDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    -- Sanitize inputDi2015NewLine    select @input = ltrim(rtrim(replace(replace(@fraction, '''', ''), '"', '')))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    select @whole = cast(caseDi2015NewLine        when charindex('/', @input) = 0 then @inputDi2015NewLine        when charindex(' ', @input) = 0 then '0'Di2015NewLine        else left(@input, charindex(' ', @input) - 1)Di2015NewLine        end as int)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    select @dividend = cast(caseDi2015NewLine        when charindex('/', @input) = 0 then '0'Di2015NewLine        when charindex(' ', @input) = 0 then left(@input, charindex('/', @input) - 1)Di2015NewLine        else substring(@input, charindex(' ', @input) + 1, charindex('/', @input) - charindex(' ', @input) - 1)Di2015NewLine        end as int)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    select @divisor = cast(caseDi2015NewLine        when charindex('/', @input) = 0 then '1'Di2015NewLine        else right(@input, charindex('/', reverse(@input)) - 1)Di2015NewLine        end as int)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    select @output = cast(@whole as float) + (cast(@dividend as float) / cast(@divisor as float))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return @outputDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLine

11559674Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void CreateUpdate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //UPDATE "TABLE" SET "AD_USERID" = :AD_USERID,  WHERE (("AD_USERID" = :Original_AD_USERID) AND ("MODULE" = :Original_MODULE)) AND ((:IsNull_MODIFIED_BY = 1 AND ""MODIFIED_BY"" IS NULL) OR (""MODIFIED_BY"" = :Original_MODIFIED_BY))Di2015NewLine        DataTable tbl = _DsViews.Tables[_DbName];Di2015NewLine        string value = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        string where = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in tbl.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value += string.Format("\\"{0}\\" = :{0},", col.ColumnName.ToUpper());Di2015NewLine            if (GetOraType(col.DataType) == OracleType.Blob)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            if (col.AllowDBNull || col.DataType == typeof(DateTime))Di2015NewLine                where += string.Format("((:IsNull_{0} = 1 AND \\"{0}\\" IS NULL) OR (\\"{0}\\" = :Original_{0})) AND ", col.ColumnName.ToUpper());Di2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine                where += string.Format("(\\"{0}\\" = :Original_{0}) AND ", col.ColumnName.ToUpper());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        value = value.Substring(0, value.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine        where = where.Substring(0, where.Length - 5);Di2015NewLine        string sql = string.Format("UPDATE \\"{0}\\"  SET {1} WHERE ({2})", _DbName, value, where);Di2015NewLine        ta.UpdateCommand = new OracleCommand(sql, MyDBConnection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in tbl.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ta.UpdateCommand.Parameters.Add(new OracleParameter(col.ColumnName.ToUpper(), GetOraType(col.DataType), 0, ParameterDirection.Input, col.ColumnName.ToUpper(), DataRowVersion.Current, false, null));Di2015NewLine            if (GetOraType(col.DataType) == OracleType.Blob)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            if (col.AllowDBNull || col.DataType == typeof(DateTime))Di2015NewLine                ta.UpdateCommand.Parameters.Add(new OracleParameter("IsNull_" + col.ColumnName.ToUpper(), OracleType.Int32, 0, ParameterDirection.Input, col.ColumnName.ToUpper(), DataRowVersion.Original, true, null));Di2015NewLine            ta.UpdateCommand.Parameters.Add(new OracleParameter("Original_" + col.ColumnName.ToUpper(), GetOraType(col.DataType), 0, ParameterDirection.Input, col.ColumnName.ToUpper(), DataRowVersion.Original, false, null));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11559774Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int[] JaggedSizes<T>(this T[][][] topArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> rtn = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    rtn.Add(topArray.Length);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < topArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var midArray = topArray[i];Di2015NewLine        rtn.Add(midArray.Length);Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < midArray.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var botArray = midArray[j];Di2015NewLine            rtn.Add(botArray.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return rtn.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Thanks @Dave BishDi2015NewLinepublic static T[] ToFlat<T>(this T[][][] jagged)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return jagged.SelectMany(inner => Di2015NewLine        inner.SelectMany(innerInner => innerInner)).ToArray(); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T[][][] FromFlatWithSizes<T>(this T[] flat, int[] sizes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int inPtr = 0;Di2015NewLine    int sPtr = 0;Di2015NewLine    int topSize = sizes[sPtr++];Di2015NewLine    T[][][] rtn = new T[topSize][][];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < topSize; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int midSize = sizes[sPtr++];Di2015NewLine        T[][] mid = new T[midSize][];Di2015NewLine        rtn[i] = mid;Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < midSize; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int botSize = sizes[sPtr++];Di2015NewLine            T[] bot = new T[botSize];Di2015NewLine            mid[j] = bot;Di2015NewLine            for (int k = 0; k < botSize; k++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bot[k] = flat[inPtr++];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return rtn;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11563689Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Fixed FromFloatSafe(float f) {Di2015NewLine    // Extract float bitsDi2015NewLine    uint fb = BitConverter.ToUInt32(BitConverter.GetBytes(f), 0);Di2015NewLine    uint sign = (uint)((int)fb >> 31);Di2015NewLine    uint exponent = (fb >> 23) & 0xFF;Di2015NewLine    uint mantissa = (fb & 0x007FFFFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check for Infinity, SNaN, QNaNDi2015NewLine    if (exponent == 255) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    // Add mantissa's assumed leading 1Di2015NewLine    } else if (exponent != 0) {Di2015NewLine        mantissa |= 0x800000;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Mantissa with adjusted signDi2015NewLine    int raw = (int)((mantissa ^ sign) - sign);Di2015NewLine    // Required float's radix point shift to convert to fixed pointDi2015NewLine    int shift = (int)exponent - 127 - FRACTION_SHIFT + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Do the shifting and check for overflowsDi2015NewLine    if (shift > 30) {Di2015NewLine        throw new OverflowException();Di2015NewLine    } else if (shift > 0) {Di2015NewLine        long ul = (long)raw << shift;Di2015NewLine        if (ul > int.MaxValue) {Di2015NewLine            throw new OverflowException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (ul < int.MinValue) {Di2015NewLine            throw new OverflowException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        raw = (int)ul;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        raw = raw >> -shift;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Fixed.FromRaw(raw);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11566358Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Makes all text after a colon (until the end of line) upper-case.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class UppercaseGenerator : VisualLineElementGeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override int GetFirstInterestedOffset(int startOffset)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextDocument document = CurrentContext.Document;Di2015NewLine        int endOffset = CurrentContext.VisualLine.LastDocumentLine.EndOffset;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = startOffset; i < endOffset; i++) {Di2015NewLine            char c = document.GetCharAt(i);Di2015NewLine            if (c == ':')Di2015NewLine                return i + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override VisualLineElement ConstructElement(int offset)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DocumentLine line = CurrentContext.Document.GetLineByOffset(offset);Di2015NewLine        return new UppercaseText(CurrentContext.VisualLine, line.EndOffset - offset);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Displays a portion of the document text, but upper-cased.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class UppercaseText : VisualLineTextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public UppercaseText(VisualLine parentVisualLine, int length) : base(parentVisualLine, length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override VisualLineText CreateInstance(int length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new UppercaseText(ParentVisualLine, length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override TextRun CreateTextRun(int startVisualColumn, ITextRunConstructionContext context)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (context == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("context");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int relativeOffset = startVisualColumn - VisualColumn;Di2015NewLine            StringSegment text = context.GetText(context.VisualLine.FirstDocumentLine.Offset + RelativeTextOffset + relativeOffset, DocumentLength - relativeOffset);Di2015NewLine            char[] uppercase = new char[text.Count];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < text.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine                uppercase[i] = char.ToUpper(text.Text[text.Offset + i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return new TextCharacters(uppercase, 0, uppercase.Length, this.TextRunProperties);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
